text: crispy deep-fried calamari squid rings
tossed in a tasty creamy spicy and
buttery salted egg yolk sauce this could
easily become your favorite ways to
enjoy squid let's get cooking
ingredients you will need 300 gram
calamari some panko bread crumbs tempura
flour some all-purpose flour eggs 3
salted egg yolk 2 tbsp sweetened
condensed milk butter and garlic peel
and discard the innards of this calamari
rinse well and cut into rings crack 2
eggs in a bowl and beat well dip the
calamari ring into the beaten egg then
roll over the tempura flour back to the
beaten egg and then roll over the bread
crumbs then deep fry to golden brown and
place on paper towel to drain off the
excess oil
rinse the salted egg with cooking wine
and steam for about 10 minutes then
combine in a food processor with 2 tbsp
of sweetened condensed milk and 2
tablespoons of chili sauce then blix
away
now in a pan saute some minced garlic
until fragrant then add the salted egg
sauce mix the all-purpose flour with
water and pouring to thicken the sauce
then add the fried calamari rings and
toss well so that they are well coated
in the sauce finally garnish with some
chili flakes and serve as a side dish
with rice also as a drinking snack it's
crispy on the outside soft and slightly
chewy on the inside the creamy rich and
savory egg yolk really melt in your
mouth so simple but incredibly tasty i
hope you will give it a try and don't
forget to click like and subscribe to my
channel for more amazing recipes like
this i will see you then next time bye
you
